Documentation for Stockfighter Client
=====================================

Release History
---------------

v 0.10 (04/30/2016)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Features:

* Gamemaster API client
* Stockfighter API client
* OrderType enum for easier order sending
